title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 432.6 - Requirements for written notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 432.6 - Requirements for written notification

State Regulations

Written notification to the subject(s) or other persons
named in a report of suspected child abuse or maltreatment assigned to the
investigative track shall be in accordance with language required by
OCFS. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
432.6

Amended, New

York State Register October 22, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 42, eff. 10/22/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
